summary: Kids Fun App is a neon-themed, kid-friendly React + TypeScript web app (with Internet Computer/ICP integration) that bundles multiple modules: a Learn Hub with interactive lessons and voice narration, a large library of 2D mini-games (canvas and DOM-based) wrapped in a shared game shell, creative tools (green-screen photo scenes, dance routines with optional webcam, a 2D canvas video generator), curated safe YouTube channel hub, events/calendar tools, profile/avatar customization, seasonal activities with story reading, a rewards economy (spin wheel, points/badges, trophies), and a virtual pet hub whose customization unlocks are driven by earned points. Kids Fun App is a React + TypeScript web application backed by an Internet Computer (Motoko) canister. It provides a kid-friendly hub experience with many playable mini-games (mostly canvas/DOM-based), creative tools (story builder, sticker creator, music remix), community features (jokes, art gallery, feedback), learning activities (science/nature and discovery-zone lessons with optional text-to-speech), and administrative/parental controls (user approvals, admin dashboard). Authentication is handled via Internet Identity; data access is organized through React Query hooks to the Motoko backend, which implements access control roles, user approval, story project storage/moderation, virtual pet trophy accounting, and video channel management/favorites.

existing_features.title: App-wide typography baseline (Google fonts + Tailwind font families)
existing_features.description: Tailwind is configured with explicit font families for hero headlines (Luckiest Guy), section titles (Bubblegum Sans), and body text (Varela Round + Poppins).

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication context
existing_features.description: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that initializes AuthClient, loads stored identity, supports login via identityProvider, and supports logout/clear with error/status state.

existing_features.title: Identity-aware ICP backend actor initialization
existing_features.description: Creates an anonymous or authenticated canister actor using createActorWithConfig; when authenticated, calls initializeAccessControl() and invalidates/refetches non-actor react-query caches upon actor changes.

existing_features.title: Centralized React Query hooks with localStorage-backed persistence
existing_features.description: Implements queries/mutations for user profiles, chat/presence, game state, trophies, jokes, feedback, approvals/admin data, seasonal events, avatar config, story projects, crafts, art gallery submissions, points/badges/rewards, spin wheel reward history, certificates, stickers, music remixes, invention stories, and event notifications; many are backed by localStorage where backend methods are not available.

existing_features.title: Dashboard module launcher with search filtering
existing_features.description: Displays module cards (games, scary hub, video hub, smart hub, virtual pet hub, learn hub, creative hub, events, chat, cards, jokes, rewards, etc.) with a search box to filter by title/description and a clear-search control.

existing_features.title: Mascot guide with contextual help and optional voice narration
existing_features.description: Floating mascot button shows page-specific help messages, auto-hides after timeout, supports manual close/reopen, and can narrate via SpeechSynthesis with a voice toggle.

existing_features.title: Learn Hub navigation with local progress and star ratings
existing_features.description: Organizes lessons into categories, supports category/lesson selection, provides a voice toggle, and persists per-lesson completion and earned stars in localStorage under learnHubProgress.

existing_features.title: Learn Hub activity: Reading & Vocabulary
existing_features.description: Implements multiple reading mini-activities (phonics prompts, word builder, story comprehension questions, spelling unscramble, vocabulary cards) with step progress, feedback UI, speech synthesis narration, and star-based completion.

existing_features.title: Learn Hub activity: Arts & Music
existing_features.description: Implements arts/music activities (color mixing quiz, drawing prompts with canvases, rhythm pattern playback visualization, instrument explorer, creative prompts) with progress tracking, feedback UI, and optional speech synthesis narration.

existing_features.title: Shared GameLayout shell for games
existing_features.description: Provides consistent game UI including back navigation, restart button, sound toggle UI, score/best-score display, trophy display, game-over overlay, and an upgrade dialog that spends trophies via updateGamesTrophies().

existing_features.title: Reusable webcam/camera hook
existing_features.description: Encapsulates camera support detection and lifecycle: start/stop streams, switch facing mode, retry, and capture photos to File using a canvas; exposes video/canvas refs and loading/error state.

existing_features.title: Creative Fun Hub launcher
existing_features.description: Landing page that links into creative modules (Interactive Shorts, Green Screen Fun, Karaoke Mode, Dance Challenge) using onNavigate routing.

existing_features.title: Green Screen Fun (photo/camera into cartoon scene)
existing_features.description: Allows uploading a photo or capturing from webcam, previews it centered over a selected cartoon scene, and downloads a composite image rendered on a hidden canvas.

existing_features.title: Dance Challenge routines with timed prompts and optional webcam
existing_features.description: Selectable dance routines with start/pause; advances through pose prompts on a timer and optionally shows a mirrored webcam feed using useCamera; cleans up timer and camera on unmount.

existing_features.title: 2D video generator (canvas animated preview + download)
existing_features.description: Generates a 15-second canvas animation from a user story plus selected character and background; supports play/pause and downloads the preview as an image via canvas.toBlob.

existing_features.title: Kids YouTube Videos Hub (curated by age range)
existing_features.description: Curates kid-friendly YouTube channels grouped by age category; provides channel detail view with attribution and safety notices and links out to YouTube when embedding is blocked.

existing_features.title: Events calendar module (basic UI)
existing_features.description: Calendar picker and upcoming events list with a create-event dialog; events are stored in component state only (no persistence).

existing_features.title: Events page with day-of notifications and dismissal
existing_features.description: Maintains a simple in-page event list and polls todayâ€™s events via useGetTodaysEvents; renders timed notification cards and dismisses them via useDismissEventNotification (localStorage).

existing_features.title: Event Card Creator (templates + preview + download/share toasts)
existing_features.description: Card preview with selectable templates; user can edit title/message and trigger simulated download/share actions (toast-based).

existing_features.title: Event cards designer page (templates/colors preview UI)
existing_features.description: Create card title/message, select a template and gradient color, preview the card, and download (toast). Includes an empty 'My Cards' gallery tab.

existing_features.title: Profile customization (name + avatar/theme UI)
existing_features.description: Allows updating user display name via useSaveCallerUserProfile, selecting an emoji avatar and theme (local UI state), and shows an achievements preview grid.

existing_features.title: Avatar creator (mix-and-match parts + save)
existing_features.description: Lets users select emoji-represented parts (head, hair, body, pants, headwear, shoes), randomize configurations, preview the assembled avatar, and save via useSaveAvatarConfig (localStorage).

existing_features.title: Feedback form UI (toast-based, non-persistent)
existing_features.description: Collects feedback type, satisfaction rating, title/description, and anonymous flag; validates required fields and shows success toasts; does not persist in this component.

existing_features.title: Printable certificate generator (canvas render + download)
existing_features.description: Renders a high-resolution certificate onto a canvas with wrapped text and background image overlay, stores certificate metadata via useCreateCertificate, lists saved certificates, and downloads as JPEG.

existing_features.title: Spin-the-wheel rewards with cooldown and history
existing_features.description: Animated prize wheel UI that calls useSpinWheel; enforces a 20-minute cooldown using localStorage lastSpinTime; supports Mystery Box extra spin behavior; displays reward history via useGetSpinRewardHistory.

existing_features.title: Smart Hub (daily pick, recently played, recommendations)
existing_features.description: Generates a daily pick with stable per-day storage, tracks recently played activities in localStorage, and recommends activities using difficulty filter plus user gameState history; persists difficulty setting.

existing_features.title: Seasonal Events hub (activities, decorations, stories + narration script)
existing_features.description: Determines seasonal theme by month, tracks completed activities in local state, applies decoration selection, and displays a story list with a dialog that toggles between kid-safe story text and a read-along narration script.

existing_features.title: Seasonal story dataset (kid-safe stories + read-along scripts)
existing_features.description: Provides a static TypeScript dataset of stories with title/genre plus kidSafeText and narrationScript (performance cues) for read-along mode.

existing_features.title: Approval gate for unapproved users
existing_features.description: Wrap component that blocks access when useIsCallerApproved() is false; lets the user request approval via useRequestApproval and shows loading state while checking approval status.

existing_features.title: Achievement celebration overlay (confetti/fireworks)
existing_features.description: Global portal-driven overlay with a small queue system; can be triggered programmatically to show confetti or fireworks animations and a congratulatory message.

existing_features.title: Emotion feedback overlay (encouraging toast-like bubbles)
existing_features.description: Global portal-driven message bubbles that display randomized encouraging messages (or custom messages) for a short duration via a shared trigger function.

existing_features.title: Virtual Pet Hub (pet creation + customization unlocks by points)
existing_features.description: Allows creating/saving a virtual pet via backend actor methods, displays pet mood based on happiness, shows growth stage progress derived from earned points, and allows equipping accessories/decorations gated by points; includes feed/play actions that trigger celebrations/feedback and a save-changes flow.

existing_features.title: Craft & DIY project browser (with steps and completion)
existing_features.description: Category-filtered craft list with project detail view (safety tips, materials, steps, badges) and a 'Mark as Completed' action wired to a mutation (localStorage-backed hook).

existing_features.title: Real-time style chat (online presence + direct messages)
existing_features.description: Chat UI that updates online status on mount/unmount, polls online users and direct messages, sends messages via useSendChatMessage, and displays messages with timestamps; uses Principals for sender/recipient IDs.

existing_features.title: Chat module mock UI (hardcoded contacts/messages)
existing_features.description: Standalone chat UI with fake contacts and message list maintained in component state, emoji shortcut buttons, and message send handling (no backend).

existing_features.title: Scary Hub (spooky-themed game launcher)
existing_features.description: Kid-friendly spooky hub that lists themed games (Monster Maze, Spider Web Puzzle, Pumpkin Smash), includes sound toggle UI and a surprise animation trigger.

existing_features.title: Game: Space Station Life
existing_features.description: Role-based space-station simulation with day progression, resource consumption, random events with accept/decline outcomes, role-based income/score gain, and arrow-key movement.

existing_features.title: Game: Gadget Combat
existing_features.description: Top-down action game with arrow-key movement, gadget selection (keys 1â€“4), click-to-activate gadget effects, enemy chasing AI, capture/stun mechanics, and cooldown system.

existing_features.title: Game: Slime Evolution Arena
existing_features.description: Canvas arena game where the slime absorbs enemies to grow and evolve into special forms (magnet, explosive, giant) with timed effects; game ends when enemy count exceeds a threshold.

existing_features.title: Game: Lies and Truths
existing_features.description: Canvas platformer featuring an AI narrator that provides periodic hints (some true, some false); player must test platforms and reach the goal to advance levels.

existing_features.title: Game: Memory Match
existing_features.description: Emoji card matching game with increasing grid size as levels increase; tracks moves, score, and completion-based level ups.

existing_features.title: Game: Cat With a Grappling Hook
existing_features.description: Physics-based canvas game: click to grapple toward a point, collect fish, avoid dog enemies; includes gravity/friction and win/lose conditions.

existing_features.title: Game: Shape-Shifting World
existing_features.description: Collectible-based adventure where the player transforms into forms (keys 1â€“4) to pass obstacle types (water/hole/air) and clears stars to advance levels.

existing_features.title: Game: Ambulance Rescue
existing_features.description: Top-down rescue game with arrow-key movement, patient spawning, proximity rescue scoring, and a 60-second countdown timer.

existing_features.title: Game: The Screen Is Your Enemy
existing_features.description: Canvas survival/collection game where periodic screen effects (shake/shrink/rotate) occur and drain player health while collecting stars.

existing_features.title: Game: Police Buddy Chase
existing_features.description: Lane-based chase game where criminals spawn/move down lanes; player switches lanes to catch them; speed increases with score and game ends if a criminal escapes.

existing_features.title: Game: Bosses Learn Your Habits
existing_features.description: Canvas boss fight where the boss predicts player movement based on recent input history; player dodges and shoots with spacebar; win/lose based on health.

existing_features.title: Game: Eclipse Now Solo (adaptive hints + dynamic difficulty)
existing_features.description: Space survival game with energy orb collection, enemy types (chaser/shooter/patrol), projectile system, health bar, eclipse lighting effect, and AI hint system that adjusts difficulty based on player performance metrics.

existing_features.title: Game: Pac-Man
existing_features.description: Grid-based Pac-Man with generated maze walls, pellet collection, simple ghost pursuit AI, lives system, and requestAnimationFrame-based timing.

existing_features.title: Game: You Can Only Move When You Blink
existing_features.description: Canvas game where movement is only possible during short blink windows triggered by spacebar; enemies are dangerous only when not blinking; reach goal to win.

existing_features.title: Game: City Built on Moving Platforms
existing_features.description: Canvas platformer with a rotating world and moving/rotating platforms; player runs/jumps across shifting platforms and scores by distance/progress.

existing_features.title: Game: Tetris
existing_features.description: Classic Tetris with tetromino spawning, movement/rotation, line clearing, scoring, level-based drop speed, and next-piece preview.

existing_features.title: Game: Sound-Based World (echolocation navigation)
existing_features.description: Dark canvas exploration game where movement generates expanding sound waves that reveal obstacles and the goal via radial gradients.

existing_features.title: Game: Glitch World Escape
existing_features.description: Canvas platformer with toggleable glitch mode (G key) that flips which platforms are solid (glitched vs normal), enabling progression across levels.

existing_features.title: Game: Enemy Controls the Camera
existing_features.description: Canvas game where the camera follows the enemy rather than the player; player collects coins and avoids being caught while navigating under a shifting viewpoint.

existing_features.title: Game: Inventory Is the Enemy
existing_features.description: Canvas game where collecting items increases inventory weight, reducing speed and draining health above thresholds; player can drop items with E; win by reaching goal.

existing_features.title: Game: One-Button Hero
existing_features.description: Canvas runner controlled via SPACE press duration: tap=jump, hold=dash, long hold=shield; includes obstacle spawning and cooldown indicators.

existing_features.title: Game: Time-Loop Pizza Delivery
existing_features.description: Canvas delivery game with a recurring 60-second loop reset; deliver pizzas, remove nearby obstacles with spacebar, track loop count, and win by delivering all pizzas.

existing_features.title: Game: Escape Room Universe
existing_features.description: Timed multi-room scavenger game with three themed rooms; find items to complete rooms and unlock the next within a global timer; includes an inventory display and keyboard room switching (1â€“3).

existing_features.title: Game: Dungeon Janitor Simulator
existing_features.description: Canvas cleaning game: move to clean debris types (trap/monster/cursed) for different points while new debris spawns; win at a score threshold.

existing_features.title: Game: Tiny Hero, Giant World
existing_features.description: Large-world canvas exploration/platform game with camera follow, coin collection, goal detection, and a mini-map HUD.

existing_features.title: Game: Find Famous Places
existing_features.description: Multiple-choice geography quiz where players pick the location of famous landmarks; tracks score and high score across a fixed question set.

existing_features.title: Game: Delayed Controls
existing_features.description: Canvas game where movement inputs are queued and applied after a fixed delay; collisions penalize score; collect coins and reach the goal for bonus points.

existing_features.title: Game: Number Runner
existing_features.description: Educational runner that generates math problems with multiple-choice answers; selecting correct answers increases score; wrong answers end the run.

existing_features.title: Game: Super Speedy Racer
existing_features.description: Three-lane obstacle dodging racer with increasing speed; player changes lanes with arrow keys; collision ends the game.

existing_features.title: Game: Pumpkin Smash
existing_features.description: Timed whack/click canvas game with bouncing pumpkins; clicking a pumpkin removes it, awards points, and spawns another; 30-second timer.

existing_features.title: Game: Birthday Cake Maker
existing_features.description: Step-based creative builder: choose cake base, flavor, and number of layers; awards points for choices and completion; shows stacked cake preview.

existing_features.title: Game: Birthday Cake Decorator
existing_features.description: Click-to-place decoration game: pick decoration emoji and click cake area to place; score increases per placement and adds completion bonus.

existing_features.title: Game: Cronker Kontry (idle clicker)
existing_features.description: Idle/clicker economy game with resources (gold/food/power), buildings with passive income, upgrades, achievements, and a prestige reset that grants a permanent multiplier.

existing_features.title: Game: Spider Web Puzzle
existing_features.description: Untangling puzzle where players click two connected nodes to remove a web connection; clears levels when all connections are removed, with win after final level.

existing_features.title: Game: Grandma's Secret Arcade (multi-minigame menu)
existing_features.description: Canvas arcade menu that includes three minigames (Whack-a-Mole, Cookie Catch, Memory Match) with an on-screen grandma narrator bubble; ESC returns to menu.

existing_features.title: Game: Monster Maze
existing_features.description: Maze navigation game where player avoids moving monsters and reaches an exit tile; keyboard-controlled movement with canvas rendering and win/lose states.

existing_features.title: Game: The Tutorial Is the Villain
existing_features.description: Canvas survival game where a fake tutorial delivers misleading messages and spawns traps/fake coin hazards; player manages health and reaches the goal to finish.

existing_features.title: Game: Boss Fight Only
existing_features.description: Canvas sequence of three bosses with changing mechanics (reversed controls and gravity-reversed variant). Player attacks with space when close and dodges projectiles.

existing_features.title: Game: Time-Control Adventure (slow/freeze/rewind powers)
existing_features.description: Top-down action game with time powers (slow, freeze, rewind) on cooldown; multiple enemy types with projectile firing; health system, coin collection, and difficulty scaling over time.

existing_features.title: Backend utility: IC HTTP outcalls wrapper
existing_features.description: Motoko module providing httpGetRequest/httpPostRequest wrappers over IC management canister http_request with cycles budgeting, custom headers, idempotency key for POST, and a transform function that strips response headers.

existing_features.title: Backend utility: blob storage authorization and GC workflow
existing_features.description: Motoko modules that sync authorized gateway principals from a cashier canister, provide authorized dead-blob deletion confirmation and GC trigger, and support cashier refill/top-up with cycles. Includes a certificate creation stub returning upload metadata.

existing_features.title: App shell, module navigation, and global providers
existing_features.description: Provides the main application container with ThemeProvider, React Query client, toast Toaster, a shared Header, and a state-based module router (ModulePage) that switches between hubs, tools, and games.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication with logout cache reset
existing_features.description: Header integrates Internet Identity login/logout; on logout it clears identity and wipes React Query cache, then navigates back to dashboard. Admin link is conditionally shown based on isCallerAdmin.

existing_features.title: Responsive header navigation with mobile drawer
existing_features.description: Header renders desktop navigation buttons and a mobile Sheet-based menu. Shows profile/feedback shortcuts and optional Admin entry when caller is admin.

existing_features.title: Footer branding component
existing_features.description: Displays a footer with year branding and an external link to caffeine.ai.

existing_features.title: URL parameter and secret handling utilities
existing_features.description: Utility functions to read params from query or hash routing, persist them in sessionStorage, and securely extract secrets from the hash then remove them from the URL history using replaceState.

existing_features.title: User profile setup (child profile creation)
existing_features.description: Collects name and age with validation (5â€“12). Saves a caller profile via backend mutation with defaults (screenTimeLimit, contentFilterLevel, parentPrincipal, etc.).

existing_features.title: Jokes module (browse, submit, rate, favorites)
existing_features.description: Browse jokes by category or all; pick a random joke; submit jokes with category selection; rate jokes 1â€“5; add/remove favorites; view favorites tab. Uses React Query hooks for fetching and mutations and displays toast feedback.

existing_features.title: Art gallery (private gallery, public gallery, image upload)
existing_features.description: Allows users to view their own artwork and public approved artwork. Includes an upload flow with drag/drop or file picker, preview, validation (image type, <10MB), and submission to backend as base64 data URL with optional public visibility requiring approval.

existing_features.title: Story Builder (multi-scene drag-and-drop + backend save + preview)
existing_features.description: Drag-and-drop scene editor with multiple scenes, selectable backgrounds, characters/props, text bubbles, element deletion, scene add/remove, and a preview dialog that plays scenes sequentially. Persists stories to backend by converting UI elements into backend Scene/Character/Prop/TextBubble structures.

existing_features.title: Sticker & emoji creator (canvas drawing + backend save + approved sticker library)
existing_features.description: Canvas-based drawing tool with brush size and color palette, touch/mouse drawing, clear reset to white background, and saving to backend as PNG bytes. Displays a grid of approved stickers using blob direct URLs.

existing_features.title: Music Remix Studio (loop mixing, playback, visualization, export, save)
existing_features.description: Lets users add audio loops by category, adjust per-track volume via sliders, preview playback using Web Audio (AudioContext + AnalyserNode) with animated visualizer canvas, and export a rendered mix using OfflineAudioContext. Submits remix audio to backend and downloads the exported file locally.

existing_features.title: Video Generator UI (templates, characters, stickers, effects)
existing_features.description: Provides a configuration UI for creating a video: title, duration slider, and selection of templates/characters/stickers/effects. Includes preview/export buttons and validation feedback via toasts (creation is UI-only here).

existing_features.title: Karaoke Mode (song library + lyric progression)
existing_features.description: Selectable song list with lyrics displayed line-by-line. Play/pause advances the highlighted lyric line on a timer derived from song duration; includes vocal/music volume sliders (UI state).

existing_features.title: Interactive Shorts (branching choice-based story player)
existing_features.description: Story list UI and a scene player where each scene shows an image and text and presents choices that move to the next scene. Includes restart and back-to-list navigation.

existing_features.title: Funny Fart Hub soundboard (Web Audio synthesis + animations)
existing_features.description: Large grid of sound buttons that synthesize varied sounds using Web Audio oscillators, filters, and envelopes. Supports sound on/off, random â€œsurpriseâ€ play, and on-click puff emoji animations.

existing_features.title: Feedback submission and history
existing_features.description: Submit feedback with selectable type (general, bug report, feature request, safety concern, parent feedback) and text. Shows a history list with resolved/pending status, timestamps, and category badges.

existing_features.title: Rewards dashboard (points, achievements, badges, virtual pet progress)
existing_features.description: Displays user points, games played, achievements count, virtual pet level/progress, and a badge collection derived from backend badge proofs and calculated milestones. Triggers celebration/positive feedback for earned badges.

existing_features.title: Games Hub catalog (filtering and navigation)
existing_features.description: Lists available games with thumbnails, categories, and descriptions; includes category filter buttons and navigation to selected game modules; includes a sound toggle state and a simple stats section.

existing_features.title: Balloon Pop game
existing_features.description: Timed 60-second balloon clicking/tapping game. Balloons spawn over time with normal/bonus/penalty scoring, pop visual effects, simple synthesized pop sounds, and high score tracking.

existing_features.title: Bibble Adventure platformer game
existing_features.description: Simple platformer with left/right movement and jumping, gravity, platform collision checks, coin spawning on platforms, coin collection by proximity, score and high score tracking, and game-over on falling off-screen.

existing_features.title: Mind Maze Puzzle game
existing_features.description: Room-based puzzle game with clickable rooms that open a puzzle overlay (color/pattern/sequence). Correct answers mark rooms solved and award points; wrong answers reduce score; game ends when all rooms are solved.

existing_features.title: Theme Park Builder simulation game
existing_features.description: Click-to-place ride management game with selectable ride types (cost/income), grid placement with occupancy checks, periodic income and score increases, happiness/visitor simulation, and game-over when happiness drops too low.

existing_features.title: Superpower Training game (power unlocks)
existing_features.description: Side-scrolling obstacle interaction game with moving targets/enemies/walls. Player moves with arrows; score unlocks powers (speed/flight/shield) and can switch via number keys; collision rules depend on active power; includes level indicator and high score.

existing_features.title: One Room, Infinite Games (rotating mini-game collection)
existing_features.description: Canvas game that rotates every 10 seconds among four modes: dodge projectiles, collect coins, memory sequence input (keys 1â€“4), and platformer jumping. Shares player state and a countdown bar; awards score on survival/completion; game-over on collisions/falls/failures.

existing_features.title: Speed Is Health survival game
existing_features.description: Top-down canvas survival where player health drains when moving slowly and regenerates when moving fast. Includes obstacles that block movement, collectible stars that boost score and health, and game-over when health reaches zero.

existing_features.title: Reverse Progression platformer (abilities removed per level)
existing_features.description: Platformer where the player starts with multiple abilities (double jump, dash, shield, slow time) and loses them as levels increase. Includes enemies, goal reaching for progression, and canvas UI showing remaining abilities.

existing_features.title: Everything Breaks After One Use platformer
existing_features.description: Canvas platformer where platforms start breaking after the first time they are used, disappearing after a short timer. Player must reach a goal to advance levels; falling off ends the game.

existing_features.title: You Control the Enemies game
existing_features.description: Puzzle/strategy canvas game where the player character automatically moves toward a goal while the user selects and moves enemies (1â€“9 keys + movement keys) to influence the path. Touching an enemy ends the game; reaching the goal progresses levels.

existing_features.title: Enemies Are the Platforms game
existing_features.description: Platformer variant where flying enemies act as moving platforms if landed on from above; touching their sides/below causes game over. Reaching the goal advances levels.

existing_features.title: Pause Is a Mechanic game (pause-triggered effects)
existing_features.description: Top-down coin collection game where pressing P pauses the game and triggers random effects after a short delay (spawn hazard, rewind player position, or teleport). Includes hazards, scoring for collecting stars, and game-over on hazard collision.

existing_features.title: You're Late, Always chaotic survival game
existing_features.description: Canvas survival/escape game with escalating chaos per level: bouncing projectiles, expanding explosions, and fire zones drain health. Player must survive and reach an exit to level up; score increases over time and on completion.

existing_features.title: Everything Is a Button game
existing_features.description: Canvas game with many on-screen buttons; clicking triggers effects such as teleporting the player, revealing a goal, or altering score. Player moves with keyboard and wins by reaching the revealed goal.

existing_features.title: You Are the Final Boss defense game
existing_features.description: Tower-defense-like canvas game where the user places traps by clicking and selects trap type with 1/2/3. Heroes spawn in waves and move toward the boss; traps damage heroes; heroes that reach the boss reduce boss health until game over.

existing_features.title: The Floor Is a Liar platformer
existing_features.description: Canvas platformer with labeled platforms (SAFE/DANGER) where labels may be incorrect. Landing on unsafe platforms triggers game over; reaching the goal advances levels.

existing_features.title: Space Invaders game
existing_features.description: DOM-rendered Space Invaders-style shooter with keyboard movement and shooting, enemy marching and descent, enemy bullets, lives, wave progression, and instruction overlay; uses refs and requestAnimationFrame for game loop updates.

existing_features.title: Tic Tac Toe (PvP and AI modes)
existing_features.description: Classic 3x3 Tic Tac Toe with mode selection (local PvP or AI). Includes win detection, draw detection, highlighted winning line, and a simple AI (win/block/center/corner/random) with thinking delay and toast notifications.

existing_features.title: Word Wizard word scramble game
existing_features.description: Timed word scramble game with a random word list, shuffled letters selection/removal UI, check/skip actions, word-found tracking, scoring by word length, and high score handling.

existing_features.title: Learn Hub: Science & Nature interactive lessons
existing_features.description: Interactive lesson component supporting weather quiz, space quiz, animal habitat matching, and plant life-cycle sequencing. Includes progress bar, scoring, star awarding via onComplete, and optional speech synthesis narration/feedback.

existing_features.title: Learn Hub: Discovery Zone activities and invention stories
existing_features.description: Discovery-themed activity component supporting facts, how-it-works steps, world explorer items, and inventions. For inventions, it can display invention stories fetched from backend hooks and tracks read stories in localStorage with optional speech synthesis narration.

existing_features.title: Parental control UI with admin-driven approval management
existing_features.description: Parental control page includes screen time slider, content filter level select, feature toggles, an activity report (UI), and an admin-only approvals tab to approve/reject user access requests via listApprovals and setApproval mutations.

existing_features.title: Admin dashboard UI for monitoring and management
existing_features.description: Admin-only dashboard UI with navigation tabs for overview, users, content, moderation, analytics, and settings. Includes user search list, status change dialog with reason, restriction mutations scaffolding, safety alerts display, and multiple analytics/settings placeholders.

existing_features.title: Backend: role-based access control
existing_features.description: Motoko AccessControl module assigns the first initializing principal as admin and subsequent principals as users; provides permission checks, admin checks, and admin-only role assignment.

existing_features.title: Backend: user approval workflow
existing_features.description: Backend maintains per-principal approval status and supports requesting approval, admin setting approval status, and listing approvals (admin-only). isCallerApproved returns true for admins or approved users.

existing_features.title: Backend: user profile storage
existing_features.description: Stores and retrieves user profiles keyed by principal, with authorization enforcing that only authenticated users can save profiles and only self/admin can view profiles.

existing_features.title: Backend: story project CRUD and moderation
existing_features.description: Implements save, list caller stories, get story (owner/admin), update, delete (owner/admin), publish (sets published=true and approved=false), admin list all stories, and admin approval for published stories.

existing_features.title: Backend: virtual pet data and trophy accounting
existing_features.description: Provides get/save virtual pet for caller (and get for self/admin). Includes updateGamesTrophies (deduct trophies per game) and welcomeBackReward (adds bonus trophies), with defaults if no pet exists.

existing_features.title: Backend: video channel directory with admin CRUD, view tracking, and favorites
existing_features.description: Admin can add/update/delete video channels. Public can list/get channels and increment views/lastPlayed. Authenticated users can mark/unmark favorite channels and retrieve their favorites list.

existing_features.title: Update the app-wide theme tokens and global styles so the default (light) UI uses: main background #D6F0FF, sections/cards #FFFFFF, primary headings #2B2B2B, and primary buttons #FFE066 with dark text. Implement this by adjusting the CSS variables and base styles in frontend/src/index.css (replace the current neon/gradient token values and gradient body background).

Remove/replace the hardcoded gradient background wrapper in frontend/src/App.tsx (currently using "bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-100 via-pink-100 to-blue-100") so the top-level app container uses the global theme background (the new #D6F0FF background) consistently across all routes/pages.

Update primary button styling to match the new theme: primary buttons render with background #FFE066 and dark text (use #2B2B2B or equivalent theme token), including hover/focus states that keep the button yellow and text dark (no neon glow/text-shadow that makes the text appear bright). Apply via theme tokens in frontend/src/index.css so existing button components inherit the new style without changing feature logic.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update global UI color theme: main background #D6F0FF, cards/sections #FFFFFF, primary headings #2B2B2B, buttons #FFE066 with dark text; no other feature/CRUD changes.

architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + TypeScript with a custom in-app navigation model (pages receive an onNavigate(ModulePage) callback rather than react-router).
UI is built from shadcn/ui-style primitives (Card/Button/Tabs/Dialog/etc.) styled with TailwindCSS and custom neon utilities (shadows/text-shadow/animations).
Data access is centralized in a large TanStack React Query hooks module (useQueries.ts), with many features backed by localStorage as a temporary persistence layer where backend APIs are missing.
Authentication integrates Internet Identity (AuthClient) via a context/provider hook (useInternetIdentity).
Backend access is abstracted behind an identity-aware canister actor hook (useActor) created via createActorWithConfig() and initialized with initializeAccessControl().
Games share a common GameLayout wrapper for header HUD, restart/back controls, sound toggle UI, trophy display, and a post-game upgrade dialog.
Many games are implemented as canvas apps using requestAnimationFrame and mutable refs (useRef) for game state to reduce render churn; simpler games use DOM positioning plus timers.
Voice guidance uses the browser SpeechSynthesis API (e.g., MascotGuide and Learn Hub activities).
Camera features are encapsulated in a reusable useCamera hook that manages getUserMedia lifecycles and photo capture to File.
Some backend utilities are included as Motoko modules (IC HTTP outcalls wrapper and blob-storage authorization/GC helpers).
known_issues: useQueries.ts writes BigInt and Principal instances into localStorage via JSON.stringify (e.g., chatMessages, onlineUsers, feedback, gameStates). JSON serialization of BigInt throws and Principals will not round-trip correctly, likely breaking persistence at runtime.
ArtsMusicActivity uses dynamic Tailwind class names like `bg-${color}-500`; Tailwind will not generate these classes unless safelisted, so colors may be missing in production builds.
LearnHubPage loads/parses localStorage progress without try/catch; corrupted learnHubProgress can crash the page.
Several hooks are placeholders/incomplete (e.g., useGetLeaderboard returns empty array; admin restriction mutations only console.log; useGetUserRestrictions returns empty array).
EventsPage hardcodes Baloo 2 font in inline styles, conflicting with the new global typography baseline.
Some games generate random visuals directly during render (e.g., star backgrounds), which can cause visual jitter across re-renders.
Some high-score updates depend on captured state inside timers/loops and can be off in edge cases (stale closures).
VideoGeneratorPage uses CanvasRenderingContext2D.roundRect, which may not exist in older browsers without a polyfill.
GameLayoutâ€™s dialog claims â€œEach game costs 2 trophies to playâ€, but the implemented trophy spending is tied to the â€˜Upgrade Petâ€™ action (actor.updateGamesTrophies), not game start.

Some modules have overlapping/duplicate experiences (e.g., EventsModule vs EventsPage, ChatModule vs ChatPage, EventCardCreator vs EventCardsPage), potentially causing inconsistent UX and persistence.
